rows.label: qst700801_msg0001
rows.name:
My, my. Do you need something
from this old woman?

rows.label: qst700801_msg0002
rows.name:
I am Oulu, and I used to run an
accessory shop in this capital.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0003
rows.name:
Recently, since I left the
shop to my granddaughter,
walking has become my hobby.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0004
rows.name:
The Outrider's Forest Trail
in front of the capital is
my favorite course.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0005
rows.name:
On a nice day, it's
such a pleasant walk.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0006
rows.name: But lately...

rows.label: qst700801_msg0008
rows.name:
Every time I go for a walk, there's
so much trash in the forest.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0009
rows.name:
At first, whenever I found
trash, I would clean it up.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0010
rows.name:
But if I look away for a moment,
the trash piles up so quickly, I
just can't handle it anymore.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0011
rows.name:
At this rate, my pleasant
walk will be ruined.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0012
rows.name:
If you'd be so kind, would
you help me pick up the
trash in the forest?

rows.label: qst700801_msg0101
rows.name:
There's always a lot
of trash left behind.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0102
rows.name:
I think there should be about
four pieces this time, so please
search the forest thoroughly.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0201
rows.name: The culprits are Nopon... I see.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0202
rows.name: I knew it. It was those kids' doing.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0203
rows.name:
Please, could you find all those
kids and tell them to come see me?

rows.label: qst700801_msg0204
rows.name:
Those kids always used the capital
as their playground, so they must be
hiding somewhere within the city.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0205
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0301
rows.name: I knew it, that trash was their doing.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0302
rows.name:
Please, could you find all
of those brothers and tell
them to come see me?

rows.label: qst700801_msg0303
rows.name:
Those kids always used the capital
as their playground, so they must be
hiding somewhere within the city.

rows.label: qst700801_msg0304
rows.name: I'm counting on you.
